quote: You can be sure of succeeding in your attacks if you only attack places which are undefended.You can ensure the safety of your defense if you only hold positions that cannot be attacked.
quote_letters: YOU CAN BE SURE OF SUCCEEDING IN YOUR ATTACKS IF YOU ONLY ATTACK PLACES WHICH ARE UNDEFENDEDYOU CAN ENSURE THE SAFETY OF YOUR DEFENSE IF YOU ONLY HOLD POSITIONS THAT CANNOT BE ATTACKED
source: Sun Tzu, The Art of War
